_description: Christ’s sacrifice — two couplets commenting on ‘Corpus Christi liquessebat’ which precedes them in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Cristis bodi maltȝÞe soule it sualtȝÞe blod
                    was spiltȝFor mannis gilt
